Test.Name: Door control service is supported (GetServices metod)
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported Door control service is supported Door Entity is supported

Test.Name: Door control service is supported (GetServices metod)
Test.Description: DUT does not return correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: not supported GetServices: supported Door control service is supported Door Entity is supported

Test.Name: Door control service is not supported (GetServices metod)
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response does not contain “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported Door control service is not supported

Test.Name: Door control service is not supported (GetServices metod)
Test.Description: DUT does not return correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response does not contain “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: not supported GetServices: supported Door control service is not supported

Test.Name: All features under Door Entity are supported (GetServices metod)
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace GetDoorInfoList response contains DoorInfo with: Capabilities.Access = true Capabilities.Lock = true Capabilities.Unlock = true Capabilities.DoubleLock = true Capabilities.Block = true Capabilities.LockDown = true Capabilities.LockOpen = true Capabilities.DoorMonitor = true Capabilities.LockMonitor = true Capabilities.DoubleLockMonitor = true Capabilities.Alarm = true Capabilities.Tamper = true Capabilities.Fault = true

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported Door control service is supported Door Entity is supported Following features are supported: • Access Door • Lock Door • Unlock Door • Double Lock Door • Block Door • Lock Down Door • Lock Open Door. • Door Monitor • LockMonitor • DoubleLockMonitor • Alarm • Tamper • Fault

Test.Name: All features under Door Entity are supported (GetServices metod)
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace DUT sends 2 DoorInfos GetDoorInfoList response contains DoorInfo with: Capabilities.Access = true Capabilities.Lock = true Capabilities.Unlock = true Capabilities.DoubleLock = true Capabilities.Block = true Capabilities.LockDown = true Capabilities.LockOpen = true Capabilities.DoorMonitor = true Capabilities.LockMonitor = true Capabilities.DoubleLockMonitor = true Capabilities.Alarm = true Capabilities.Tamper = true Capabilities.Fault = true

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported Door control service is supported Door Entity is supported Following features are supported: • Access Door • Lock Door • Unlock Door • Double Lock Door • Block Door • Lock Down Door • Lock Open Door. • Door Monitor • LockMonitor • DoubleLockMonitor • Alarm • Tamper • Fault

Test.Name: All features under Door Entity are not supported (GetServices metod)
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace GetDoorInfoList response contains only one DoorInfo with: Capabilities.Access = false Capabilities.Lock = false Capabilities.Unlock = false Capabilities.DoubleLock = false Capabilities.Block = false Capabilities.LockDown = false Capabilities.LockOpen = false Capabilities.DoorMonitor = false Capabilities.LockMonitor = false Capabilities.DoubleLockMonitor = false Capabilities.Alarm = false Capabilities.Tamper = false Capabilities.Fault = false

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported Door control service is supported Door Entity is supported Following features are NOT supported: • Access Door • Lock Door • Unlock Door • Double Lock Door • Block Door • Lock Down Door • Lock Open Door. • Door Monitor • LockMonitor • DoubleLockMonitor • Alarm • Tamper • Fault

Test.Name: All features under Door Entity are not supported (GetServices metod)
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace GetDoorInfoList response contains only one DoorInfo without: Capabilities.Access Capabilities.Lock Capabilities.Unlock Capabilities.DoubleLock Capabilities.Block Capabilities.LockDown Capabilities.LockOpen Capabilities.DoorMonitor Capabilities.LockMonitor Capabilities.DoubleLockMonitor Capabilities.Alarm Capabilities.Tamper Capabilities.Fault

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported Door control service is supported Door Entity is supported Following features are NOT supported: • Access Door • Lock Door • Unlock Door • Double Lock Door • Block Door • Lock Down Door • Lock Open Door. • Door Monitor • LockMonitor • DoubleLockMonitor • Alarm • Tamper • Fault

Test.Name: GetDoorInfoList: fault (GetServices metod)
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace DUT sends fault on GetDoorInfoList request

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported Door control service is supported Door Entity is supported Following features are undefined:
• Access Door • Lock Door • Unlock Door • Double Lock Door • Block Door • Lock Down Door • Lock Open Door.

Test.Name: GetDoorInfoList: no response (GetServices metod)
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace DUT sends no response on GetDoorInfoList request

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported Door control service is supported Door Entity is supported Following features are undefined:
• Access Door • Lock Door • Unlock Door • Double Lock Door • Block Door • Lock Down Door • Lock Open Door.

Test.Name: Door Control Events support: all events are supported (GetServices metod)
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace GetEventPropertiesResponse contains: tns1:Door/State/DoorMode Event topic tns1:Door/State/DoorAlarm Event topic tns1:Door/State/DoorPhysicalState Event topic tns1:Door/State/DoubleLockPhysicalState Event topic tns1:Door/State/LockPhysicalState Event topic tns1:Door/State/DoorTamper Event topic tns1:Door/Cahnged Event topic tns1:Door/Removed Event topic tns1:Door/State/DoorFault Event topic

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported Door control service is supported Door/State/DoorMode event is supported Door/State/DoorAlarm event is supported Door/State/DoorPhysicalState is supported Door/State/DoubleLockPhysicalState is supported Door/State/LockPhysicalState is supported Door/State/DoorTamper is supported Door/Cahnged is supported Door/Removed is supported Door/State/DoorFault is supported

Test.Name: Door/Cahnged and Door/Removed events are supported (GetServices metod)
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace GetEventPropertiesResponse contains: tns1:Door/Cahnged Event topic tns1:Door/Removed Event topic

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported Door/State/DoorMode event is not supported Door/State/DoorAlarm event is not supported Door/State/DoorPhysicalState is not supported Door/State/DoubleLockPhysicalState is not supported Door/State/LockPhysicalState is not supported Door/State/DoorTamper is not supported Door/Cahnged is SUPPORTED Door/Removed IS SUPPORTED Door/State/DoorFault is not supported

Test.Name: Only Door/Removed event is supported (GetServices metod)
Test.Description:
DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace GetEventPropertiesResponse contains:
tns1:Door/Removed Event topic

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported Door control service is not supported Door/State/DoorMode event is not supported Door/State/DoorAlarm event is not supported Door/State/DoorPhysicalState is not supported Door/State/DoubleLockPhysicalState is not supported Door/State/LockPhysicalState is not supported Door/State/DoorTamper is not supported Door/Cahnged is not supported Door/Removed IS SUPPORTED Door/State/DoorFault is not supported

Test.Name: only DoorFault event is supported (GetServices metod)
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace GetEventPropertiesResponse contains: tns1:Door/State/DoorFault Event topic

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported Door control service is supported Door/State/DoorMode event is not supported Door/State/DoorAlarm event is not supported Door/State/DoorPhysicalState is not supported Door/State/DoubleLockPhysicalState is not supported Door/State/LockPhysicalState is not supported Door/State/DoorTamper is not supported Door/Cahnged is not supported Door/Removed is not supported Door/State/DoorFault IS SUPPORTED

Test.Name: Only Door/Changed event is supported (GetServices metod)
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace GetEventPropertiesResponse contains: tns1:Door/Cahnged Event topic

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported Door control service is supported Door/State/DoorMode event is not supported Door/State/DoorAlarm event is not supported Door/State/DoorPhysicalState is not supported Door/State/DoubleLockPhysicalState is not supported Door/State/LockPhysicalState is not supported Door/State/DoorTamper is not supported Door/Cahnged IS SUPPORTED Door/Removed is not supported Door/State/DoorFault is not supported
